00037 #ifndef CaptureThread_h
00038 #define CaptureThread_h
00039 
00040 #include <QThread>
00041 #include <QMutex>
00042 //#include "OpenCV/Image.h"
00043 #include "OpenCV/Capture.h"
00044 
00045 using namespace OpenCV::VideoIO;
00046 using namespace OpenCV::Bitmap;
00047 
00048 const double DEFAULT_FPS = 24.97; /* Default fps for PAL video systems */
00049 
00055 class CaptureThread : public QThread
00056 {
00057 public:
00058 // Constructors
00065     CaptureThread(const Capture&, Image*&, double = DEFAULT_FPS);
00066     virtual ~CaptureThread() { }
00067 
00068 // Getters & Setters
00073     inline Image*& imageHandler() { return m_capturedImage; }
00074 
00076     inline double fps() { return m_fps; }
00077     inline void setFPS(double fps) { m_fps = fps; }
00078 
00079 // Public Methods
00081     inline void startCapturing() { if (!this->isRunning()) this->start(); }
00083     inline void stopCapturing() { m_kill = true; }
00084 
00085 protected:
00086 // Protected Methods
00087     virtual void run();
00088 
00089     QMutex m_mutex;
00090     double m_fps;
00091     Capture m_capture;
00092     Image* m_capturedImage;
00093 
00094     bool m_kill;
00095 };
